|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, Mini PCIe |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = 2 |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, 4-pin header,, |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = DOCSIS 3.0 |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Askey |manuf_model = PKE1331 |manuf_rev = -08 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 07/26/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Broadcom BCM943227HM4L |rad1modif = Mini PCIe (half) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43227; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== There are at least four versions, all using the same hardware: * '''TC7200''' (unbranded version; concurrent dual band Wi-Fi) ([http://www.pomagam.net/art.php?10 photos]) * '''TC7200.U''' (UPC-branded version, stripped-down firmware) * '''TC7200.d''' (EMTA functionality removed) * '''TC7200.20''' (unbranded version) ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.speedguide.net/routers/technicolor-thomson-tc7200-wireless-voice-cable-3073 On '''SpeedGuide'''] *[https://hackaday.io/project/3441-technicolor-tc7200-cable-modem On '''HackaDay'''] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== Connector J305: 
___________________
|  *   *   *   *  |
------      -------
3.3v  TX  GND  RX

Speed: (115200 8N1)

}} ==Pictures== *[http://www.boards.ie/vbulletin/attachment.php?attachmentid=293572&d=1392234932 Main PCB] *[http://www.pomagam.net/images/7200/347200.JPG Main board] ==See also== *[[technicolor TC7300]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/H8N-TC7300 H8N-TC7300] (06/30/2015) :(same PCB, but without USB and physical on/off switch) *[[technicolor TC7300.B0M]] • FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/H8N-TC7300B0M H8N-TC7300B0M] (05/27/2016) :SoC: BCM3383Z/BCM43217, 2x LAN, OUI: 00:11:E3, PSU: 12V/1.5A *[[technicolor TC8305C]] (Comcast) *[[technicolor TC8706C (Comcast)]] *[[technicolor TC8717C]] (Comcast) [[Category:English Documentation]]
